title: Riot Privacy
body: Hi,I have a question for a friend. Can police control messages from the game? I mean,if there is a trial,can police access information(a.k.a reading messages) ? I mean without one's consent,of course. I would greatly appreciate an answer from a Rioter.

replies.body: Local authority can email recordkeeper@riotgames.com to make requests.  You can also review your own logs by visiting the [Privacy ](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/)page, though it includes a small processing fee.
